channel.title: Combat + username
channel.description:
http://prntscr.com/6911qm
I don't understand what this is or how to fix it. But you can see the usernames and how my actual name is something different. I am also level 126 but sometimes appears as level 1" or level 0". But in the combat interface i'm shown as level 126 so that is fine... :S I have tried searching these random names in the server + client but nothing comes up. I'm assuming it's a random string named something else. This is a mix source/client between deception v2 and process pk bases. I have also deleted the skill "summoning." Which may affected the cmb viewed.
Has anyone ever experienced this issue? :S

item.title: Combat + username
item.dc:creator: @portugalrox portugalrox
item.description:
@portugalrox wrote:

I think the issue is server sided, “deception” server. Because my client worked on the original client/source which is process pk.
Just not sure what the issue looks like although I did see somethings that it could be i’ll keep looking.

Read full topic

item.title: Combat + username
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

Your data isn’t matching up.
Check out the player updating block both server and client sided.
https://rswiki.moparisthebest.com/index.php?title=317_Protocol#Player_Updating

Read full topic
